name: Tag members in KlickTipp according to Thinkific course enrollment
description:
This scenario connects Thinkific with KlickTipp to automate contact tagging whenever a new course enrollment occurs.

When a student enrolls in any course on Thinkific, the scenario detects the event and routes the data to apply the corresponding tag in KlickTipp. Each course can have its own tag, allowing for precise segmentation and targeted communication.

This automation ensures that your email marketing and course engagement workflows stay synchronized. It helps you deliver the right messages to the right students without manual tagging or list management.

Easily extend the scenario to include additional courses, tags, or follow-up actions such as onboarding emails or progress tracking â€” keeping your Thinkific and KlickTipp data perfectly aligned.
